sentence.Network_en: He skimmed the pages quickly, then read them again more carefully.
sentence.Network_cn: 他先快速地浏览页面，然后再细细阅读。

sentence.Network_en: The White House quickly announced that the policy is under review.
sentence.Network_cn: 白宫很快宣布该项政策正在审核中。

sentence.Network_en: She reloaded the gun as quickly as she could.
sentence.Network_cn: 她以最快的速度再次给枪装上子弹。

entry.def: Someone or something that is quick moves or does things with great speed.

example.ex: You'll have to be quick. The flight leaves in about three hours...
example.tran: 你得快点了，飞机大约3小时后起飞。

example.ex: I think I'm a reasonably quick learner...
example.tran: 我认为我是一个学东西还算快的人。

entry.tran: (quicker 有时表示“以更快的速度”，quickest表示“以最快的速度”，quick有时表示“以很快的速度”，但有些人认为这种用法并不规范)
entry.def: Quicker is sometimes used to mean 'at a greater speed', and quickest to mean 'at the greatest speed'. Quick is sometimes used to mean 'with great speed'. Some people consider this to be non-standard.

example.ex: Warm the sugar slightly first to make it dissolve quicker...
example.tran: 先将糖稍稍加热，以使其溶解得更快些。

entry.tran: 短暂的;持续时间很短的
entry.def: Something that is quick takes or lasts only a short time.

example.ex: He took one last quick look about the room...
example.tran: 他朝房间匆匆扫了最后一眼。

example.ex: I just popped in for a quick drink...
example.tran: 我只是顺路过来小酌一杯。

entry.tran: 立刻发生的;很快发生的
entry.def: Quick means happening without delay or with very little delay.

example.ex: Officials played down any hope for a quick end to the bloodshed...
example.tran: 官员们让迅速结束这场流血冲突的希望变得渺茫起来。

example.ex: These investors feel the need to make quick profits.
example.tran: 这些投资者觉得收益必须立竿见影。

entry.tran: 迅速发生地;很快发生地
entry.def: Quick is sometimes used to mean 'with very little delay'.

example.ex: I got away as quick as I could...
Quick! John! It's Carmela. I think she's taken an overdose...
example.tran: 快来！约翰！卡梅拉出事了，我想她用药过量了。

entry.def: If you are quick to do something, you do not hesitate to do it.

example.ex: Mark says the ideas are Katie's own, and is quick to praise her talent...
example.tran: 马克说这些都是凯蒂自己的想法，并随即称赞起她的天赋来。

example.ex: Furthermore, as Gervaise was quick to point out, Mr Scully was not a detective.
example.tran: 而且，正如热尔韦斯毫不犹豫地指出来的那样，斯库利先生并不是一名侦探。

entry.tran: 性情急躁的;容易发怒的
entry.def: If someone has a quick temper, they are easily made angry.

entry.tran: 咬到了指甲肉；咬秃指甲
entry.def: If someone bites their nails to the quick, they bite off all the white part at the end of each nail.

example.ex: Her fingernails are bitten to the quick.
example.tran: 她的手指甲都被咬秃了。

entry.tran: 触及（…）痛处;极大伤害；令…伤透了心
entry.def: If something cuts you to the quick, it makes you feel very upset.

example.ex: I once heard her weeping in her bedroom, which cut me to the quick.
example.tran: 有一次，我听见她在卧室里哭泣，这深深地刺痛了我的心。

auth_sentence.content: The caramel will cool quickly and form thin strands.
auth_sentence.res_content: The caramel will cool quickly and form thin strands.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The caramel will cool quickly and form thin strands.

auth_sentence.content: It can be very effective in melting snow quickly.
auth_sentence.res_content: It can be very effective in melting snow quickly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It can be very effective in melting snow quickly.

auth_sentence.content: Saprobes, found in horse manure, grow quickly.
auth_sentence.res_content: Saprobes, found in horse manure, grow quickly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Saprobes, found in horse manure, grow quickly.

Sentence.sentence: But while printing quickly caused the hand written book to die out, handwriting lingered on (继续存在) well into the 16th century.
The ability to quickly thumb through pages is also lost
Its own oil reserves are quickly running out.
minister of social security, quickly commissioned a study to determine the causes of and possible cures for this disturbing stale of affairs.
Milkman, the sociologist, argues that American craftsmanship isn't disappearing as quickly as some would argue - that it has instead shifted to immigrants.
million jobs lost in the last three months, there is urgent desire to boost the economy as quickly as possible

sentences.cn: 未受感染的伤口瘉合得快。

sentences.en: A good student assimilates knowledge quickly.
A crowd quickly assembled to watch the cockfight.
sentences.cn: 人们立即聚集起来看斗鸡。

sentences.en: A letter sent by airmail will get to Europe quickly.
sentences.cn: 寄往欧洲的航空邮件马上就会到达。
